claim: An American media company was an employer of William Hanna.
premise_source_doc_sentence: William Denby `` Bill '' Hanna  (  July 14 , 1910 -- March 22 , 2001  )  was an American animator , director , producer , voice actor , and cartoon artist , whose film and television cartoon characters entertained millions of people for much of the 20th century .

claim: An American media company was an employer of William Hanna.
premise_source_doc_sentence: After working odd jobs in the first months of the Depression , Hanna joined the Harman and Ising animation studio in 1930 .

claim: An American media company was an employer of William Hanna.
premise_source_doc_sentence: During the 1930s , Hanna steadily gained skill and prominence while working on cartoons such as Captain and the Kids .

claim: An American media company was an employer of William Hanna.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1937 , while working at Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer  (  MGM  )  , Hanna met Joseph Barbera .

claim: An American media company was an employer of William Hanna.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The two men began a collaboration that was at first best known for producing Tom and Jerry and live action/animated hybrid films .

claim: An American media company was an employer of William Hanna.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1957 , they co-founded Hanna-Barbera , which became the most successful television animation studio in the business , producing programs such as The Flintstones , The Huckleberry Hound Show , The Jetsons , Scooby-Doo , The Smurfs , and Yogi Bear .

claim: An American media company was an employer of William Hanna.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 1967 , Hanna-Barbera was sold to Taft Broadcasting for $ 12 million , but Hanna and Barbera remained heads of the company until 1991 .

claim: An American media company was an employer of William Hanna.
premise_source_doc_sentence: At that time , the studio was sold to Turner Broadcasting System , which in turn was merged with Time Warner in 1996 ; Hanna and Barbera stayed on as advisors .

claim: An American media company was an employer of William Hanna.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Hanna and Barbera won seven Academy Awards and eight Emmy Awards .

claim: An American media company was an employer of William Hanna.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Their cartoons have become cultural icons , and their cartoon characters have appeared in other media such as films , books , and toys .

claim: An American media company was an employer of William Hanna.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Hanna-Barbera 's shows had a worldwide audience of over 300 million people in their 1960s heyday , and have been translated into more than 28 languages .

claim: An American media company was an employer of William Hanna.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 2013 , the Journal Register Company became known as 21st Century Media , an American media company .

claim: An American media company was an employer of William Hanna.
premise_source_doc_sentence: 21st Century Media was an American media company , serving an audience of 21 million Americans in 992 communities .

claim: An American media company was an employer of William Hanna.
premise_source_doc_sentence: William Hanna  (  1910 -- 2001  )  was an American animator , director , producer , television director , television producer , and cartoon artist .

claim: An American media company was an employer of William Hanna.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Hanna-Barbera Productions , Inc.  (  simply known as Hanna-Barbera and also referred to as H-B Enterprises , H-B Production Company and Hanna-Barbera Cartoons , Inc.  )  was an American animation studio that dominated American television animation for over three decades in the mid 20th century .

claim: An American media company was an employer of William Hanna.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Best known for his work with William Hanna and Joseph Barbera at MGM and later at their own Hanna-Barbera Productions , Eisenberg illustrated a large number of comic book stories and comic strips starring characters such as Tom and Jerry , Yogi Bear , and The Flintstones , while also working as an animation layout artist and character designer on the cartoons themselves .
